executive_summary.summary: Comprehensive AI discovery analysis for CloudScale Analytics identifying 7 strategic use cases across customer retention, sales efficiency, and product optimization. Total potential annual savings of $2.9M with an average ROI of 92%.

use_cases.title: Predictive Churn Analysis
use_cases.description: ML model that identifies at-risk customers 30-60 days before churn by analyzing product usage patterns, support tickets, and engagement metrics.

use_cases.title: AI-Powered Lead Qualification
use_cases.description: Intelligent lead scoring system that analyzes firmographics, behavior, and engagement to prioritize high-value prospects for sales team.

use_cases.title: Intelligent Support Ticket Routing
use_cases.description: NLP-powered system that automatically categorizes, prioritizes, and routes support tickets to the most appropriate specialist based on content and urgency.

use_cases.title: Product Usage Analytics
use_cases.description: AI-driven analytics that identifies feature usage patterns, predicts feature adoption, and guides product roadmap decisions with data-backed insights.

use_cases.title: Automated Onboarding Optimization
use_cases.description: ML system that personalizes onboarding flows based on user role, industry, and behavior to accelerate time-to-value and reduce drop-off.

use_cases.title: Dynamic Pricing Optimization
use_cases.description: AI-powered pricing engine that tests and optimizes pricing tiers, discounts, and packaging based on customer segments and willingness to pay.

use_cases.title: Content Personalization Engine
use_cases.description: ML-based system that personalizes in-app messaging, email campaigns, and feature recommendations based on user behavior and preferences.
